Annotation.String: Oem data related to the Volume Instance.
Oem data related to the Volume Instance.
Oem data related to the Volume Instance.
Oem data related to the Volume Instance.
A resource representation of DellVirtualDisk.
A resource representation of DellVirtualDisk.
The property shall represent the bus protocol.
The property shall represent the bus protocol.

The property represents the Cachecade capabilities of a Controller. It can have a value of CachecadeVD or NonCachecadeVD. If a Controller is Cachecade Capable, for creating VD as CachecadeVD, only RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant is supported. Only the properties RAIDType/VolumeType, Name/DisplayName, Links/Drives, Cachecade are consumed. Any other valid Schema supported property is ignored. During CachecadeVD creation, if the user passes any value other than RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant, incoming values will get overwritten with RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant.

The property represents the Cachecade capabilities of a Controller. It can have a value of CachecadeVD or NonCachecadeVD. If a Controller is Cachecade Capable, for creating VD as CachecadeVD, only RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant is supported. Only the properties RAIDType/VolumeType, Name/DisplayName, Links/Drives, Cachecade are consumed. Any other valid Schema supported property is ignored. During CachecadeVD creation, if the user passes any value other than RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant, incoming values will get overwritten with RAIDType = RAID0 or VolumeType = NonRedundant.
The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.
The property shall represent the policy for physical disks included in the virtual disk.
The property shall represent if this Virtual Disk is locked.
The property shall represent if this Virtual Disk is locked.
The property shall represent the drive media type.
The property shall represent the drive media type.
The property shall represent the number of spans in virtual disk.
The property shall represent the number of spans in virtual disk.
The property shall represent the number of physical disks per span.
The property shall represent the number of physical disks per span.
The property shall represent the virtual disk target number.
The property shall represent the virtual disk target number.
This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time when System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was last performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property provides the time when the data was last updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
This property represents the virtual disk configuration state.
This property represents the virtual disk configuration state.
This property represents the operation that is running on a virtual disk in background. If no operation is running, the value is "None".
This property represents the operation that is running on a virtual disk in background. If no operation is running, the value is "None".
This property represents the percentage of completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.
This property represents the percentage of completion of the operation that is represented by the OperationName property.
This property represents the status of the device.
This property represents the status of the device.
This property represents the RAID specific status.
This property represents the RAID specific status.
This property provides information about the remaining redundancy of the virtual disk.
This property provides information about the remaining redundancy of the virtual disk.
This property represents the starting logical block address in blocks for virtual disk.
This property represents the starting logical block address in blocks for virtual disk.
This property represents the current strip size.
This property represents the current strip size.
T10PIStatus indicates whether T10 Protection Information is enabled on the virtual disk.
T10PIStatus indicates whether T10 Protection Information is enabled on the virtual disk.
